name: Another Warfare
description:
Your enemies in this war are demons, but are you sure about that?
Experience a game when you uses your rifle and the skill of stop the time to fight your enemies in this warfare!
Another Warfare is a 2d platformer shooter, but here, time moves only when you move.

Featuring:

  • Stylized pixel-art;
  • 30+ hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity;
  • A shooter game with a stunning and polished game feel;
  • Enjoy the dangers of the Another Warfare;
